department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Number: WS4225132351

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites responses from qualified Supply Arrangement Holders to the Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of the S-6063EC-3 Blower Assembly for Transport Canada's Air Services Directorate (ASD).

**Scope of Work**
The requirement is for the acquisition of the S-6063EC-3 Blower Assembly for the Bell 429 aircraft. This RFP is open only to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for procurement T8493-140035 series.

**Invited Suppliers**
The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Supplies Inc
* Non-Destructive Testing Products Ltd
* Bell Textron Canada (Contracts)
* Dart Aerospace
* Maxcraft Avionics Ltd
* MHD Rockland
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Ltd
* Pole Air Aviation
* Simex Defence Inc
* Szabo Aviation
* Textron Aviation
* Tower Aerospace
* Tulmar Safety
* Unisource Technology Inc
* Zepoli International Inc
* PHP Canada
* BSF International Inc
* Helitrades Inc
* Field Aviation
* Alpine Aerotech
* JHT Defense
* Kadex Aero Supply
* National Helicopters
* Newcastle Aviation Partners LLC
* Optima Aero
* Southeast Aerospace
* Canada West Avionics
* Skyline Helicopter Technologies
* Eagle Copters
* Genaire LTD
* Kitchener Aero (dba Mid-Canada Mod Center)
* Tronosjet Maintenance
* Aero Technical Components
* Arnprior Aerospace
* Pratt & Whitney Canada
* Bristow Instruments (1977) Ltd
* CASP Aerospace Inc

**Procurement Details**

* Solicitation Number: WS4225132351
* Publication Date: September 28, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 29, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 31, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
* Region of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Contact
